description: Verify user can login with valid username and password
expectedResult: User should be logged in successfully and redirected to dashboard

description: Verify system handles invalid login attempts correctly
expectedResult: System should display appropriate error message
User should receive password reset email
Search results should match search criteria
Products should be filtered by selected category

description: Verify adding products to shopping cart
expectedResult: Product should be added to cart successfully

description: Verify updating product quantity in cart
expectedResult: Cart quantity should be updated correctly
Product should be removed from cart
